name: ROCKETGUN - 0.3 - DEMO
description:
"ROCKETGUN" a challenging one button game.

leftmousebutton = shoot 

[how to play?] shoot the ground or bounce of your bullets to launch yourself in the air! but watch out, there are many different enemies that shoot at you! to finish a level you have to reach the goal.

extra controlls [r = restart / e = menu / space = continue]

WARNING! ITS VERY HARD AT THE END! DONT GIVE UP!

are you stuck? watch me play ROCKETGUN!

you liked this game? than follow me on twitter @DAnKeL317 https://twitter.com/DAnKeL317

rocketgun was made within 7 days for the #BoundlessJam!

if there is demand for more levels or further development, i will continue working on this game and make it even better!

planned features/updates:
  • speedrun mode
  • collectables
  • level reworks (make them easier)
  • better enemy/obstacle placement
  • add more levels/enemys/obstacles
  • better menus/ui

do you have any suggestions? let me know!
